title: Staff Directory and Profile UI
description:
Staff Directory Page with Professional Profiles

Create a comprehensive staff directory page that displays team member profiles with their credentials, contact information, and professional details.

Requirements:
- Design and implement a staff directory listing page showing all team members
- Create individual profile cards or sections for each staff member containing:
  - Full name and job title/role
  - Professional credentials (degrees, certifications, licenses)
  - Contact information (email, phone number, office location)
  - Professional photo/headshot
  - Brief bio or description (optional)
- Implement search and filter functionality to find staff by name, department, or role
- Ensure responsive design that works on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
- Add sorting options (alphabetical, by department, by role)
- Consider accessibility standards for screen readers and keyboard navigation
- Determine data source (CMS, database, static content) and implement accordingly
- Handle edge cases: staff with missing photos, incomplete contact info, or special characters in names
